name: backrest
description: Backrest is a user-friendly dashboard for managing PostgreSQL backups using pgBackRest. It gives a visual web interface for configuring, scheduling, and restoring PostgreSQL backups in self-hosted environments.
features: PostgreSQL Backups: User-friendly dashboard for pgBackRest management. Simplified database backups.
Visual Interface: Web-based UI for backup configuration. No command line needed.
Backup Scheduling: Automate backup timing and frequency. Set and forget.
Restore Operations: Easy database restoration from backups. Quick recovery.
Backup Monitoring: Track backup status and health. Stay informed.
Cross-Platform: Works on Linux, Windows, and macOS. Universal compatibility.
Self-Hosted: Run your own backup management. Complete control.
Production Ready: Reliable solution for critical databases. Enterprise-grade.
